actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for commuting expenses incurred on public mass transit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an income tax deduction of up to $250 per year for public mass transit commuting expenses.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for commuting expenses incurred on public mass transit.
